thread.title: Obama returns to promise to ‘politicize’ gun issue
thread.title_full: Obama returns to promise to ‘politicize’ gun issue - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Obama returns to promise to ‘politicize’ gun issue
text: LOS ANGELES — When he met Friday with the families of the nine people killed in last week’s shootings at Umpqua Community College, President Obama focused on healing and compassion. [Obama on mass shooting: ‘Somehow, this has become routine’] One day later, Obama returned to his promise, made in the aftermath of the shootings, to “politicize” […] ...
